issue.title: Atlas URDF and SDF collision geometries vastly different

content.raw: Stefan, this is due to urdf / rviz (idk which one it is, I think urdf?) only supporting one collision model per link. So this is more of a problem on ROS' side to fix I think (but now that ROS is part of OSRF it's at least the correct organization's issue tracker ;P ).
content.html: Stefan, this is due to urdf / rviz (idk which one it is, I think urdf?) only supporting one collision model per link. So this is more of a problem on ROS' side to fix I think (but now that ROS is part of OSRF it's at least the correct organization's issue tracker ;P ).
